name: Once Upon A Time - Demo
description:
After her grandmother's funeral, Sabrina discovers that she has been left a cottage out in the countryside.  She decides to investigate it, only to stumble into a new world where humans are extinct.

Will she be able to make it back home?  Or will she end up finding a new start in life?

Note: This is a demo of the project so far.  The art and story are subject to changes.
